text: Meticulous, professional, and reliable. Don't hesitate to work with Brooks. He did a great job mulching the mesquite trees on our property.

We had a few acres that needed to be cleared and found CTX online. Their quote was good, and Brooks was patient with all of my questions. He showed up on time with the right equipment and did exactly what he promised.

A friend recommended Brooks and we couldn't be happier with the results. He cleared 2 areas of our ranch (approx 6 acres) that we plan to use for horses. We were concerned our uneven ground, brush, and rocks would be unsafe, but now we're ready to move forward with the fences and barn. Thank you!
